title: DoktorumOnline AI
opening: Welcome to your AI-powered health assistant
fill_required_fields: Please fill in the required fields to continue.
facebook_auth_coming_soon: Sign in with Facebook coming soon
forgot_password_description: Enter the email address linked to your account, and we will send you a password reset link.
forgot_password_send_mail: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we will send you a link to reset your password.
verification_instruction: Click the link sent to your email to verify your account.
tutorial_help_button: Press this button to see the app instructions again.
tutorial_profile_card: You can click on the profile card to edit or activate it.
tutorial_add_profile: You can add a new profile from here.
health_profiles_subtitle: Manage your health information and let your AI doctor serve you better.
empty_state_message:
No profile added yet
Start by adding your first profile.
generic_error_message: Error! Please enter and try again.
delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the profile "{profileName}"?
tutorial_home: Tap this button to start a new consultation. Fill in the necessary information, and DoktorumOnline will ask you additional questions.
tutorial_chat: You can view all previous complaints and conversations here. Tap any of them to open details.
tutorial_upload: Upload your lab results, blood tests, or prescription as a PDF; DoktorumOnline will summarize it in seconds and highlight critical findings.
tutorial_profiles: You can create separate profiles for different users and update their health information.
upgrader_prompt: A new version of the app is available!
upgrader_body: The new version {{appName}} {{currentAppStoreVersion}} is ready! You are currently using version {{currentInstalledVersion}}.

complaint_form.info_text: Your complaint will be analyzed using your existing health information. Please specify only your complaint and its duration.

subtitle: Select a file or image to analyze
initial_status: Please select a PDF file or an image
must_select: You must select a PDF or an image first.
tutorial_history: You can view your previous analyses here.
tutorial_select_file: Click this button to select your PDF or image. You can upload the medical report you want to analyze here.
